stimulusHtml: Dr. Sperry records a video of Jim, a participant in split-brain research, and then plays it in class to teach students about hemispheric differences. Which of the following procedures should Dr. Sperry use to show the video in class?
choicesHtml: Obtain Jim’s permission to use the video.
Debrief Jim after the research session.
Demonstrate the educational value of the video to Jim.
